website_summaries.verdict: A lovely and durable wicker fire pit table that’s large enough for a group and comes with a removable wind guard.
pros: Table measures 52 inches to provide plenty of room for guests
Wind guard is made of glass so you can see the flames
Includes glass rocks and a durable fabric cover to protect the table
cons: Occasional complaints of a faulty igniter switch

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction,  only one tool needed and included to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be close and higher than the table to feel the heat but it takes the chill off in Chicago spring nights. Instructions are folded up inside one of the internal boxes. Would be nice if you could store the glass inside the table.
customer_reviews.author: Fall Line

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, We love the quality... I am a business owner and former welder the one thing that I noticed was the quality of the welds and the materials used.
customer_reviews.author: RichieBu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ambiance and functionality of the table. There were some minor manufacturing inconsistencies I observed during assembly and some of the metal hardware appears to be fairly soft. Had trouble with a few screws stripping or getting cross-threaded, but was still able to put it together in a way that felt sturdy. But the burner/ignition mechanism works great, the table looks good and it was a great fit for our deck.
customer_reviews.author: jeffreyandrew

customer_reviews.title: Great wicker fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great wicker fire pit. Includes the glass wind guard, plate and cover. Especially like that the propane tank is concealed inside in an easy roll out section. Was pretty easy to put together. The side panel where the tank rolls out from doesn’t line up perfect, but you cannot tell unless you are on your knees looking. Cannot get the fire to start with the electric starter. I can hear and see the spark, but it just won’t light. Not a big deal though, a grill lighter works just as easy. Overall very impressed for this price.
customer_reviews.author: GamJa

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality pit
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to sit in our Gazebo, I will say it needs 2 people to put together but 1 could do it alone it would just take longer. This item was packaged so well that there was no way for it to get damaged, everything was in perfect shape. I downloaded & printed the instructions and my husband followed it to a T, no issues whatsoever, we had it built in 30 mins, we both carried it to the backyard, put the propane tank it, lit it without issues, can’t wait till the cooler weather to use it. It’s really a very nice piece, matches the new furniture I bought to go with it, matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This...It has been manufactured incorrectly and will not come together
customer_reviews.text: The product is poorly designed with the top of it not able to bolt to the bottom. Not only that the burner doesn't work. It also has been manufactured and when put together is is very warped. Now they are playing around with repayment back to me. You can see from the picture above the top will not mount to the bottom. It's junk.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Careful who ships it... lousy package protection
customer_reviews.text: This table had all the features we wanted at the price point we were looking for. Unfortunately it was damaged during shipment. There is a dent and scratch -not big, but noticeable on a large flat surface- so be careful who ships your table and INSPECT everything before assembly. I missed the dent during initial inspection (I didn’t do it- it must have been a heavy hit by something sharp) and I already have it assembled and need it working in less than a week for guests, so I don’t plan to return it. But very disappointed in transportation. Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Nettles

customer_reviews.title: Practical and aesthetically appealing
customer_reviews.text: Paired this up with outdoor wicker sofa and chairs. The styling is very complementary to our furniture. Positive features: The table is higher than most, which makes it easier to reach for things placed on it; the tabletop is large enough to accommodate dinner plates while the fire is on; the propane cylinder stores underneath in a pull out drawer so no hose sticking out; easy to start fire; easy to assemble, took about an hour. While the fire does provide some warmth, the ambience it provides, especially with the glass wind guard in place, is soothing to the soul, and has quickly become a family gathering spot during this period of staying at home.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fire pit for several months now. It was very easy to assemble. I had it together and hooked up in about 30 minutes, and that includes unpacking. It is very well made and sturdy. It looks great and puts out plenty of heat and flame. It is holding up very well, and everyone who comes to hang out in the back yard says how great it looks. It is also large enough to serve as a table without getting your drinks or food too close to the flame and heat. The cover and glass wind guard are nice additions. This fire pit is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Elitch264

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work anymore NINE DAYS after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first - assembly instructions were pretty clear and we didn’t have the same problems as some reviewers did. However, NINE DAYS after purchasing this, it no longer stays on without pushing the knob, which floods the unit with propane. Really feel cheated because this wasn’t cheap. Husband says it’s a faulty thermal couple. Total shame, because we wanted to love this fire table and have it for a long time. Edit to the original review because customer service responded promptly and kindly about a full replacement/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with health warning
customer_reviews.text: It came with a CA heath warning for reproductive issues. Why are they selling products that are harmful?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and construction
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very sturdy. Easy to put together. Instructions were easy to follow. The sliding drawer for the propane tank makes it easy to replace. The cover they supply is of good quality. Electronic starter is an extra bonus. We’ve used it three nights in a row and are enjoying it. Only had one screw that did not go in right on a side panel. Did not effect the integrity of the table
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Broke before 1 year. No good!
customer_reviews.text: Worst choice ever to purchase this fire table. The fire table was doing great up until 6 months. Then the cover was so flimsy that it ripped on its own due to the weather. I reached out to Best Choice to see if they can accommodate, however, two reps were extremely unwilling and unhelpful to replace my items. It’s been less than a year and this expensive item has broke. I do not recommend this product. I know the reviews are high, but perhaps most are fake. Do not risk buying. It will break less than a year!!
customer_reviews.author: SuzMac

customer_reviews.title: Very bad (non existant) customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the firepit and put it together. Instructions were not too bad and it took me about an hour. However the starter doesn't light the fire. I emailed them and got a cryptic "just review these articles" type of automated response. You can't call them and they don't reply to actual email asking for help. The firepit is OK but don't expect ANY customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MIMI

customer_reviews.title: This is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This fire table even though we have only used it for over a week, is just what we were looking for. Right sized table to use as a picnic table to fit 6+ that magically transforms into a cocktail, gathering table that can take the chill off a cool evening. Easy to assemble, hidden gas tank, easy to light. We did add blue glass to some of the clear, just to match our decorating theme. The glass shield is heavy duty that just lifts off and on, plus the cover fits perfectly. One of the best purchases we have made!
customer_reviews.author: M. Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Well built, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Received our fire table middle of last week. Didn't hesitate to put together. I was very pleased at the packaging and the instructions were straight forward and well illustrated. This table is beautiful. We ordered it for our patio we are building with a gazebo, but that has not been built yet, so we put it on our front patio, and now I'm seriously considering buying a second one. The included glass flame guard is a nice added touch that you don't get with most fire tables, it has function and adds nice ambiance as the flames reflect off of the glass, giving the fire even more depth.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Campbell

customer_reviews.title: No real support
customer_reviews.text: After assembly we did not receive the rocks and the starter is not working. They offered us a credit for rocks, which has not posted to my credit card, 2 weeks after they claim to have issued it. Now they want us to send video of non functional starter. Table looks beautiful but not happy with their customer service at all!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Powers

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but assembly flawed
customer_reviews.text: I put this together with the help of my teen son. Two screw holes not properly machined, so no screw would fit properly and only half screwed in...one for top and one for tank slide out. Also, braces to firm up end with tank are too long, so push out top of side so is not flush unlike opposite end, which is. Overall, works great. Have used a whole tank and no problems with functioning, however, for the price, I expected everything to go together properly...it's not like this was the first made.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bigger than I thought it would be but we love it. The only issue We had is that the starting instructions are not very clear and it took me a while to figure it out. It does not start like a grill where one turns on the fuel control knob and then pushes the igniter. It lights like a pilot light where one turns the fuel knob to on and then push in and hold the fuel knob while pushing the igniter. Once lit the fuel knob is released. We have our fire pit on our deck under a 10 x 12 fabric covered gazebo and are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So pretty.
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed this pit. We bought blue rocks for it. It says you can put it together in 30 min. It took us a little longer. There were a couple of tricky parts and a nut that didn't fit. I really like the fact that it has an easy access drawer to get to the propane tank. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: eun

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice not to hard to put together did need more glass
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Wahlert

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service & missing part
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product and was easy to assemble by myself however it was missing a part( Burner guard) which should have been put on at factory! The entire tabletop with burner cones fully assembled but ours was missing this guard and I didn’t notice it until I had it fully assembled and started to add the fire glass. I’ve tried to contact the seller two times and have gotten zero reply back, so we haven’t been able to use it yet! Not at all happy with customer service and no phone numbers are listed anywhere only a web site to submit questions
customer_reviews.author: KATHY T.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing I have ever bought. I am very handy and this is terrible to put together. Screws came stripped. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit!
customer_reviews.text: I had a propane portable firepit in the middle of a sand area and it looked very nice, but it was back in the corner of my yard and people rarely used it. This firepit is beautiful and looks great with my wicker furniture that I've had for 5 summers. Took about and hour to assemble and now we can use it regularly. I like that it overhangs the base so there is room for your feet and a place for your food as well as a drink. Looking forward to using it this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made....they are ripping you off!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT IF IT WILL GET WET AT ALL. THE COVER DOES NOT WORK AT ALL AND THE METAL FADES IMMEDIATELY. CUSTOMER SERVICE COULD CARE LESS ABOUT THIR PRODUCTS AND CUSTOMERS. I REPEAT DO NO BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: matthew emanuele

customer_reviews.title: looks great but did not work
customer_reviews.text: after putting the whole table to together the tray that holds the tank does not slide in and out properly the arm system does not match up to allow it to close.. and yes it was put together the right way lol.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table for the money
customer_reviews.text: The table is awesome! So I have to say I'm not sure why some folks gave this a bad review or said it was difficult to assemble, when it was very easy to put together. Table is sturdy and very nice quality. Flame is more then sufficient and puts out a decent amount of heat. Im only giving this a 4 right now as I just need to see how it works for a while since I just put it together. Table looks great with the furniture we have. So far I'm very happy with the purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received this within four days of ordering! My boyfriend and I were looking for both an outdoor table to eat on but also wanted a fire pit for the nighttime. This table is super sturdy, easy to put together, aesthetically pleasing! For the price you get so many benefits including a lid, a cover for the entire table, a hook to place the lid, and glass to prevent the fire from going out on windier days
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This is an early review, having just received the unit last week. So far what I can say is the fire pit was: easy to assemble; light weight (even with the propane tank); aesthetically pleasing (imho) and goes nice with my other wicker patio furniture; fired up without trouble; puts out sufficient heat (though it was a hot day when I assembled it, and hasn't cooled down yet, so perhaps more on that later). It's nice that it comes with a cover, glass stones and the glass wind guard, so I think it's a good value. The glass wind guard was a little tricky to assemble actually, but eventually I got it. I'd give it a 4.5 if I could.
customer_reviews.author: John R Cheeseman

customer_reviews.title: Works great looks good
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I put it together in just over an hour. Instruction could be a bit better but if you take your time you can figure it out. Very sturdy, looks really good, I'm impressed. Now I did adjust the sparkier when assembled as I read the reviews. It lights every time for us. Now I thought it could have used more Glass rock. So we bought more glass on Amazon and that hid the burner
customer_reviews.author: schwart4

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fire table
customer_reviews.text: Table looks great and functions awesome. I’d say the only downside is they could’ve made it more scratch resistant. Assembly was super easy. It took about 45 minutes and i did it by myself. They provide a Allen wrench for screwing it together but much easier to just use a screw gun with a hex bit. Couple of the holes weren’t drilled perfect but I still was able to get the screws in.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Despite the reviews for it being hard to assemble, I found it rather easy......it all went together really well. The instructions are pretty easy to follow. I had a small issue with the part labeled A. It was upside down and I couldn’t figure out why it wouldn’t go together, but then I quickly noticed it was upside down. After that, it went together well. I had a hard time getting the fire to ignite. But I realized when you’re turning the knob to low, you have to push it in while hitting the ignite button. Love this fire pit. It is beautiful! Can’t wait to have some cooler weather!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.....
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck!! What a great addition to our deck. Comes with glass wind barrier, matching center cover (making it into a full table) and also very nice outdoor cover!! Was very easy to assemble and looks great. Lots of flame and heat to go with it. They also shipped it early and we got it 2 weeks earlier than estimated shipping time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Danny Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit with some assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and priced right. The assembly was straightforward but some of the Allen head bolts are fairly hard to get in and the metal is soft causing the heads to strip. I took the bolts to the hardware store and replaced them with hex head bolts of the same size and oiled the threads. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and great looking
customer_reviews.text: The unit was easy to put together and functions great. The slide-out feature to hold the propane tank is awesome. The only drawback was that the electric igniter button doesn't really work. I had to use a standard candle lighter, but no biggie. Also, the glass included to cover the burner isn't great nor is it enough to cover the burner. I highly recommend buying an extra container of colored glass. I bought blue and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: SaintsFan

customer_reviews.title: Auto lighter went out. Gas line?
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month of use and having to now light it with a fireplace/candle lighter. Replaced the battery in the starter, everything click click clicks like it SHOULD start, just doesn't. Too much of a hassle to figure out how to return it for a replacement. BUT, we LOVE this table otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Firepit
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this firepit. It arrived earlier than expected, and it was easy to assemble. We were glad that we purchased one with the glass which shields the flame from wind. We also like the cover which is easy to put on and take off. The firepit has made a nice addition to our outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.author: JKQ

customer_reviews.title: Best Fire Pit...Hands Down.
customer_reviews.text: Searched and searched until finally making a decision on this fire pit...best decision ever!!!! And trust me, if the wife loves it, I did real good. Auto ignition doesn't always seem to work, but that don't really bother me. Get you one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JESSE OROSCO

customer_reviews.title: Great table and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking and sturdy table. Took over an hour to assemble the base. After assembly I went to install the glass and noticed that one of the glass panes was cracked in shipping. I asked for a replacement and they want me to ship the whole table back. Revised...Company made it right, very happy now! Revised... Company made it right, very happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Jettmomma

customer_reviews.title: Provides heat and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This product looks fantastic - it goes really well with a wicker furniture set I purchased from Frontgate. The table puts off a lot of heat AND here's a tip -- if you have a patio umbrella over it, the heat stays down and nicely warms up the seating area around the table! I also love the amount of space around the fire to put drinks and plates. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Nice but came with a dented top.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great about this table except the metal cover was dented. Unfortunately it is in plain sight so it is not pretty. Assembly took 2 hours. No problem getting it to light as seen in other reviews. I have informed the seller and waiting to hear back to change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Schreck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table and at the right price!! 🔥
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome!! I researched and researched and found that most of the tables are only 12” tall which just doesn’t cut it next to a sectional etc this table is super solid, easy to put together, comes with a cover and just looks beautiful lit! 🔥 I turned it up all the way and the flames were ripping in the night air. It’s gonna be perfect for us on fall evenings sitting outside chatting w friends or watching sports on television. Great find! Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I researched a ton of firepits for our new backyard and I'm so glad we chose this one. A bit tricky to assemble but worth it. Lots of room around the fire to place drinks and food plates. The only critique is the glass it came with for the fire wasn't the best quality. We bought our own from a different vendor and it really brightens it up!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Y Alger

customer_reviews.title: Nice but dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but glass on one side shattered from heat from the flames. Doesn’t give off a ton of heat but expected with a gas unit. Waiting to hear back from the manufacturer. Mine is discoloring as well and it’s always covered. I’m getting white, cloudy spots.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice product- well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice- sturdy, color is gray as advertised and it went together relatively easily. Plenty of room for dinner plates and drinks around the edges. The only problem is that there was a dent in the metal lid. Trying to resolve that now.
customer_reviews.author: Cool grandma

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Over all I’m happy with this product. However it did come damage and the instructions were not that easy to follow and which screws when where.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My husband assembled without help in about 2 hours. The flame is beautiful, and provides some warmth. For fire without so much heat, there’s a glass surround. It’s high enough to use comfortably as a table for snacks, but not so high that you can’t see across.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together is a two man job or a real pain if you do it solo. It’s packaged like crap. Some of the screws don’t quite align and the metal pieces holding it together have to be forced into place. I had to make a modification to make mine actually come together that involved drilling a new hole. I never actually used the item because they sent me the wrong color. Wound up giving it to a family member. Good size. A bit wobbly but you can stabilize it with the adjustable feet. Not sure it’s worth $600.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Looks cozy in backyard
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product, made of good quality materials. The good, very easy to assemble and clear instructions coming with the product. The bad; it’s tricky to start the fire. Needed to try many times till I figured out how to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Arleides Chanis

customer_reviews.title: Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great after I put it together. I will say it was fairly easy to assemble but the pictures for the screws were not as clear regarding size differential. I easily stripped two screws but it didn't really matter. Hope to use this soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kim West

customer_reviews.title: Centerpiece of our family gatherings. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the finished look and ease of assembly. The pull out access to the gas cylinder with top side access is a great feature (no getting down on your knees to turn gas in/off or change the tank). The glass surround improves safety, blocks the wind and looks elegant. It has a weather cover for the glass beads with a built in hanger on the side of the unit (out of site but not loose). Won’t rust. I’m so impressed with the thoughtful and functional design, selection of materials, and great look. It is the centerpiece around which our family gathers to relax and reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Gene and Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love this fire place!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this firepit thinking it was going to be a perfect fit for our newly remodeled patio! We are thrilled with our purchase! We love it!! Great for entertaining! If your considering purchasing this item, I highly recommend that you do! The assemble took about and hours worth of time but everything was explained perfectly and we had no problem what so ever putting it together! My guests always ask as to where we got out fire pit? Well worth the money spent! We also love the height of the firepit, as it's a perfect reach to set down a glass/plate on it. Its a go!!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it was. Very nice table.
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit, have only had a week and we keep it covered when not using. Very easy to put together and took about an hour. It looks beautiful on our deck but best of all is that it is large enough to enjoy our meals on it so it doubles great as a dining table which is what sold us on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: We like this table/ fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Went together fairly easily.. We had a little trouble with the crossbar that was a snug fit.. Nice table, glass wind barrier, and the slide out drawer for the propane tank Is very convenient..We have only had it a week but we are very happy with this item
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Well made and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I about an hour to put this thing together but it wasn't too difficult. The end result is a very sturdy, well-made, attractive piece of patio furniture that is also functional. We can fit at least 6 people around the edge for cocktail hour!
customer_reviews.author: KD eclectic girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous buying something so expensive without seeing it in person first but it’s absolutely perfect!! Super happy! The glass inside is so pretty too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: Really am enjoying this product. Only thing concerning me at this point is the first time ignited easily. Second time starter didn’t work. Third time starter did work. Waiting to see how it stands up long term. However it adds great ambiance on my back deck as seen in video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance overload! Easy to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this fire table! It adds to ambience to the evening without being too hot. It feels very swanky and high end. We have it on our dock at our little slice of heaven on the water. Easy to put together as well. Our came with the glass wind guard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic firepit!
customer_reviews.text: This firepit is exactly what we were hoping for! It is really sturdy and looks beautiful, and we love the wide tabletop surface that we can put our drinks and plates on. It was easy to assemble, too. It was missing a cap for one of the legs, and the seller immediately responded to our email and addressed the problem. We couldn't be happier, and we are already enjoying the cooler evenings with our firepit!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, Great Value, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: After researching many options for a fire table, decided to try this model given it's features, size, price and the other reviews on Amazon. Was not disappointed! It arrived on time, was packaged well, and if you unpack the directions that are found in the fire well before assembling, it goes together fine. You won't match the size, the build quality, the included accessories (fire well cover, vinyl cover and glass wind screen) for the price. The price went up immediately after we ordered it, so we're glad we pulled the trigger when we did.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table. But does not ignite!
customer_reviews.text: The table beautiful. Not to hard to assemble. But, it will not ignite! I have contacted the seller about a replacement igniter or advise on how to get this working and have not heard a response. That was 10 days ago and just sent another message. We were looking forward to spending time outside with this keeping us warm. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Zel Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Fireeeee
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to assemble but I recommended using your own hex keys because the one provided wears out easily. It looks great and is sturdy. The heat outage is okay. My only gripe with the product is that the glass window just sits on the table and you have to manually play with the locking mechanisms on the glass to line it up symmetrically
customer_reviews.author: Bendy LaLi

customer_reviews.title: A must have!! Stop looking elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: My whole family love this fire place table. It brings elegance to our backyard especially, at night time. We enjoy marshmallows too. The price is right because we looked everywhere and nobody has the deal this one has. It came with everything, when other competitors were selling their items separately. I highly recommend this and we love the fact that it can be covered to be a table for dinners and convert back to a fireplace. We're very happy and impressed
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous firepit table
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about 45 minutes. So simple. This table is beautiful and great quality. I purchased the gray, it matches my gray wicker perfectly. The wicker on it is more of a solid gray color as is the top. The fact that it come with fire glass, a glass wind guard, a center insert, and a protective weather cover for this price is amazing. You won't be sorry with this purchase. Aside from it being easy to put together and it looking beautiful, it is easy to operate and it puts out great heat. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, dad and teenage daughter put it together in 30 minutes. Love how we can use it with table top, have flame with or without the glass. Everything about this set was perfect and we spent days and hours deciding what to order. This came with everything we wanted. And the tank sliding out so easily is an awesome feature. Seen other people struggle with getting their tanks out and turned on on their sets.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleA

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Great price. Great quality. Just a note to people fussing about start. It takes a secon or two new, then works great. Be sure to push in in and it’s just fine
customer_reviews.author: SherAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great firepit but company does not sell replacement parts.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fire table. Starts up every time with zero hassle. The last time we used it however one of the side glass wind panel literally blew up. This was after using it about 20+ times. The makers of this table were NO HELP. They do not sell replacement parts nor had the option to buy and new wind guard. You absolutely need a wind guard for this table otherwise it will not work that great. BCP needs to open up the option for replacement part options!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie J Heinsch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fire Pit Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fire pit table. Puts our a lot of heat and looks very nice! Especially like that there’s room to place glasses, etc around the edges. Would be helpful to have indicators on the sides and to have notification in directions which way they attach. They are slightly tapered so you have to have the correct ends the right way. Box was dented when it arrived and had a broken wicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, cheap product, Size is not the firebox but the wicker table size. What a scam.
customer_reviews.text: The product is substandard and the Parts don’t fit together. Spent hours and had to retrofit the base. Their return policy stinks because you can’t return in a one time package, too heavy and bulky. They credited some money after a long hassle but it cost me more than that to make it work, the size is deceiving as it is the table size and not the fire box. Save your money for an over priced wicker basket. Never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Parikh

customer_reviews.title: disapoiting!
customer_reviews.text: I think this fire pit is very nice except for the issues with the dicoloring of the top and the cheap cover. I'ts a shame I have to look at this and the company does not answer there emails!
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY GAGLIARDI

customer_reviews.title: Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping it would match our outdoor furniture and it does!!!! Pefect color,not heavy, bottle is hidden inside and it's aluminum! Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: steve kalaitzis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Firetable
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged well. Everything came in one box and nothing was damaged. The fire table assembled fairly easily. I had some issues lighting it for the first time. You have to push in on the lever and hold while igniting. The heat output is not that great unless you’re standing in front of it. I wasn’t expecting bonfire heat but at 50,000 BTU’s I’d expect to feel heat a few feet away. Either way, I’m happy with it because it was more for ambiance than a source of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need better instructions
customer_reviews.text: I love the table and it looks great on our waterside deck. The instructions did not tell you that the end piece has a top and a bottom and one end is longer than the other. I put it on upside down and spent about an extra hour figuring it out. If not for this mistake, I could have assembled it in an hour by myself. Not that it is assembled and working, we really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit was easy to assemble. It does get extremely hot when turned all the way up but that’s what I wanted. It’s made with great quality for a good price. I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J Farrier

customer_reviews.title: May have issues with regulator
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this fire pit, but the regulator needs help or new one. Fire would go out and needed to restart. Wasn’t propane issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We added some blue glass to the white glass that comes with it. The cover is great quality. A little hard to start with the built in igniter, so we use a BBQ lighter.
customer_reviews.author: W in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to assemble. The starter is a little tricky to get started but that's the worst of it. We were pretty amazed by how much heat it puts out. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Firepit is great, except that top changed color in some spots after a month, and now its been 3 months and there are more spots. We ALWAYS keep cover on when not in use and it still happened
customer_reviews.author: Galit Greenspan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well made quality product. Packaged well. Easy assembly (1hr) with necessary tool included. Beautiful finish, looks great, lots of heat with good control of flame volume. Matches our patio set from Costco. Very simple and easy to access tank for refills. Highly recommended. Good value as compared to other manufacturers with similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fire table!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love our table! easy to assemble and use. We only had 1 screw hole that didn’t line up perfectly but with a little elbow grease, we were able to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen V. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and functional, but as usual not as easy to assemble. I really don't understand why they can't use regular screws. They are using Hex wrench and corresponding screws. Everybody knows by now that they suck. I went to Home Depot and replaced them. Was done in no time after that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jentzsch

customer_reviews.title: Not for use on composite decking!!
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrated! Bought to use on my back deck. Not until I had everything unpacked and was putting it together and read the owner’s manual did I learn that this product cannot be used on composite decking. It does not warn of this in the product description on amazon. I am likely going to have to resell this item at a loss. This should have been clearly stated.
customer_reviews.author: MBowman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful fire table. Not to big or too small. Assemble was pretty easy. Heat output has been great so far, waiting to test it out in the colder months to come. I would definitely recommend buying. We bought the red dragon rocks and mixed it with the clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chenzzy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire table!
customer_reviews.text: This fire table is truly very nice. It’s very sturdy and not too difficult to assemble. The glass on the table really gives it a nice look. It is removable if you want to take it off. We are really going to enjoy this table!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Giguere

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this a five, but like others have said, the screws that came with it were not the best and had a tendency to strip when the holes did not line up perfectly. Overall, we are happy with it. Looks great on our patio and the igniter actually lit right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The best packaging of this product of any I have seen. Works great. Might have to order more rocks. A little low on them. Looks great no damage at all.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Igniter DOA
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice fire pit for the price. 1) Easy to assemble 2) Sturdy and easy to balance. 3) Quality materials. Why in the world they chose to pick a cheap igniter switch, I have no idea. It was non-functional out of the box. That's the only flaw but it's not insignificant. So, I'm only giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Todd c Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Sets up easy and looks beautiful !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. If you are looking for a great looking fire and a nice addition to a patio. If you want a fire fire to sit around get a wood pit. You don't get a ton from heat from this and no smoke ether. Just a nice colorful flame that looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with our purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this fire table. It is so easy to start and once lit provides beautiful ambience. Our friends are so impressed with it and ask where we got. Fantastic value!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Tenenbaum

customer_reviews.title: The heat it produces is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit table. I did need some help when putting it together. It looks great on our patio and I'm looking forward to using it on the cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Defective Coating- No Help from Company
customer_reviews.text: We had the table for approximately 70 days and the coating on the top of the table has humidity stains. We contacted the company due to the defect in the coating and we were notified the warranty only lasted 60 days. We are highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: A06

customer_reviews.title: Nice pit
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasn't too bad - it's easier to put together than furniture from IKEA. Very happy with the materials and sturdiness - feels very durable. Also really like the cover - fits like a glove and protects the fire pit when not in use. I've had it for about 2 weeks and it is easy to start - no issues. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jdavidson34

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS!!!!!!! Bought it April 24. Covered it using their cover for Hurricane Isaias then uncovered it and the cover pulled the paint right off the aluminum table top. Called them and they basically too bad there’s only a 60 day warranty. DONT BUY THIS OR ANY PRODUCT FROM BEST CHOICE PRODUCTS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Petruzzi

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can use as a table or fire table. We make smores on it every night. A bit hard to keep clean with the smores. I don't get much wind in yard so glass has not been necessary and can easily be moved. Can be tricky to ignite but once you get the hang of it you're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B Lustig

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this fire pit table. All our friends comment on how nice it is. We were missing two wind guard glass pieces though.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Good looking firepit
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice patio addition. We've only had it a short time, but will enjoy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice design. A bit tricky to assemble but nothing major. The heat is powerful but gets a bit low at seating level with the glass wind guard, I guess it’s expected though.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Classy touch to your backyard
customer_reviews.text: Great finished product, but assembly is tough. Pay attention to the orientation of each piece. Works great once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: btonk12

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, perfect height for use as a table top/firepit. The rattan on it is very nice. Looks great on our deck
customer_reviews.author: avid shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for price. Well made and good cover. Last bolt would not fit but works fine without it. Glad we bought it. Good heat output. Controls work well.
customer_reviews.author: WJ Epperson

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 52in Outdoor Wicker Propane Fire Pit Table 50,000 BTU w/Glass Wind Guard, Tank Holder, Cover-Brown
feature_bullets: ELEGANT OUTDOOR FURNITURE: The perfect combination of style and functionality on your patio or in the backyard, with a beautiful wicker design and aluminum tabletop

GLASS WIND GUARD: Ignite a warm, inviting flame over the sparkling glass rocks and watch it burn all night, as an included glass wind guard adds elegant appeal while keeping the fire going even during a breeze

CONVENIENT HIDEAWAY TANK HOLDER: Intelligently crafted with a pullout gas tank holder, so you can change your propane tank in a flash and tuck it away to stay completely out of sight; works with a standard 20-pound propane tank at 50,000 BTU

ENJOY MORE TABLE SPACE: Remove the wind guard, then take the lid off the built-in side hooks and place it over the pit to create more table space for family and friends to enjoy a good meal while sitting around the fire

DURABLE WICKER, WITH COVER INCLUDED: High-quality, weather-resistant wicker is woven over a sturdy, aluminum frame, and a durable fabric cover is included to ensure this fire pit table will withstand the elements; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 52"(L) x 34"(W) x 24.75"(H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars415 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
